Key Match Events: Wales scored two goals in the first three minutes
Montenegro's Driton Camaj scored the equalizer in the 73rd minute
Post-Match Reflections: Kieffer Moore talked to S4C after the game, stating they were happy with the win and found the conditions very tough
Craig Bellamy's side held on with just over a minute of additional time remaining
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match took place in difficult weather conditions with heavy rain
Montenegro had several chances to score but failed to convert them
